document.full_text: crowds set fire to a headquarters of the ruling baath party in the syrian city of deraa on sunday, residents said, as the wave of unrest in the arab world shook even one of its most authoritarian states.
document.title: wave of unrest shakes syria, crowds torch party hq
lines_and_colors: crowds set fire to a headquarters of the ruling baath party in the syrian city of deraa on sunday, residents said, as the wave of unrest in the arab world shook even one of its most authoritarian states.
